title: Still Dead
description: An anthology of horror stories based on the universe of George A. Romero features stories by Nancy Collins, Douglas Winter, and Bram Stoker Award-winner Elizabeth MassieCONTENTSForeword by Tom Savini"Introduction: Nineteen New Ways to Kick Ass" by Skipp and Spector"The Old Man and the Dead" by Mort Castle"DONt/Walk" by Chan McConnell"Necrophile" by Nancy A. Collins"Rise Up And Walk" by K.W. Jeter"One Step At A Time" by Glen Vasey"The Ones You Love" by Skipp and Spector"This Year's Class Picture" by Dan Simmons"Night of the Living Dead Bingo Women" by Simon McCaffery"Abed" by Elizabeth Massie"Come One, Come All" by Gahan Wilson"The Prince of Nox" by Kathe Koja"Beer Run" by Gregory Nicoll"Prayer" by Douglas Morningstar and Maxwell Hart"Calcutta, Lord of Nerves" by Poppy Z. Brite"I Walk Alone" by Roberta Lannes"Undiscovered Countries" by J.S. Russell"Moon Towers" by Brooks Caruthers"Passion Play" by Nancy Holder"Bright Lights, Big Zombie" by Douglas E. Winter
author: John Skipp
